author: andyh
msg: Redo synchronization in DOMStringHandle allocator.  There
was a bug in the use of Compare and Swap.  Switched to mutexes.
Changed a few plain deletes to delete [].

author: roddey
msg: The API is not in place to allow client code to make sense of start/end entity
ref calls from attribute values. So supress them for now.
